item.title: Corespondenc Alignment and the REPL
item.description: Video games are a REPL with a very rapid feedback loop.

item.title: Using the Test->Learn REPL For AWS Certs
item.description: The key to low-overhead learning is reducing the cost of correction. AWS Cloud Services is a huge collection of large, complex data objects and learning many of them rapidly requires a fat data pipeline straight into your mind. I recently had to upgrade the throughput on that data channel, and it gave me unique insights into what I call high bandwidth learning and what others call “deliberate practice”. I want to record here how that happened.
